body: Looking back, there’s also a similar unfortunate child of gods like Hephaestus. Hiruko/Ebisu, born into abnormal form and was drifted away to the sea by his parents. The author’s Hera got very powerful libido like her husband, and she’s the only goddess who could decently match him on bed, every night. ^^;
Well, that's Hephaestus. They turned the malformed god of craftsmen into an ugly bastard. XD   Also, I don't generally say stuff like this, but Hera's design is hot.
so many repeat...and poor that man...lmao
I can understand......even though I can't XD
